00121|   }
00122|   
00123|   console.log(`Translating with qwen-mt-turbo: "${text.substring(0, 50)}" from ${sourceLang} to ${targetLang}`)
00124|   
00125|   try {
00126|     const response = await fetch('https://dashscope-intl.aliyuncs.com/compatible-mode/v1/chat/completions', {
00127|       method: 'POST',
00128|       headers: {
00129|         'Authorization': `Bearer ${DASHSCOPE_API_KEY}`,
00130|         'Content-Type': 'application/json',
00131|       },
00132|       body: JSON.stringify({
00133|         model: 'qwen-mt-turbo',
00134|         messages: [
00135|           {
00136|             role: 'user',
00137|             content: `Translate from ${sourceLang === 'auto' ? 'English' : sourceLang} to ${targetLang}: ${text}`
00138|           }
00139|         ],
00140|         max_tokens: 200,
00141|         temperature: 0.1
00142|       })
00143|     })
00144|     
00145|     console.log('qwen-mt-turbo response status:', response.status)
00146|     
00147|     if (!response.ok) {
00148|       throw new Error(`API request failed: ${response.status}`)
00149|     }
00150| 
00151|     const data = await response.json()
00152|     const translatedText = data.choices[0]?.message?.content?.trim()
00153| 
00154|     if (translatedText && translatedText !== text) {
00155|       console.log('Translation successful:', translatedText)
00156|       return {
00157|         translatedText,
00158|         sourceLang: sourceLang === 'auto' ? 'auto' : sourceLang,
00159|         targetLang
00160|       }
00161|     } else {
00162|       throw new Error('No translation received or same as input')
00163|     }
00164|   } catch (error) {
00165|     console.error('qwen-mt-turbo translation error:', error)
00166|     throw error
00167|   }
00168| }
00169|
